TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Shoufeng, title = Shoufeng, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shoufeng} }

S.FORM: Shoufeng Shoufeng gu icuwa i Hualien. ala atjunangn mapuljat 206.4 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 27.53 km², ma'linaule atjunang 19.03 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 17,884 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 6,803 a daceneqlan, Amis (32%) a maqcuwa caucau. paiwan a maqcuwa caucau. sinipaljavakan taicu a rinahem(siayaya a shiu+ fungˋ hiongˋ na kinakaian a nginaingaian; siayaya a alupalan na kinakaian na sakizaya) a shoufeng gu. a i pasakacedas a vecekadan aicu a pinaljavakan a shoufeng gu i tu kalinku na taiwan. a i tjaikacedas izua ljavek. a i pasanavalj ta marlimu katua fakong. a i pasaviri ta cikasuan(ji'an gu). a i pasakaledep a navalj ta malibasi(wanrung gu). shoufeng('inamizukan: Rinahem；kai na sakizayazuku: Alupalan；kai na客家語海陸腔:shiu+ fungˋ hiongˋ)i pasakacedas a vecekad tua kalingku tua taiwan, a i tjaiviri tua ji'an, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a xiulin, a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i wanrung, a i pasanavalj izua a sefenling, sefengbin. izua a vecekadan ta gadu i tjaikaledep, ljemaveljavekan ta gadu i tjaikacedas, kazatjan i vecekad i aicu a guan. izua a pana a 木瓜溪, 知亞干溪, 荖溪imaza. azua a kinaqadavan namasan maculjuculju a kinavaliana kinaqadavan imaza. azua a natemalidu a katjunangan i ljemaveljavekan imaza, sa pinaljavek na 東部海岸國家風景區. qaw liaw a pinaqenetjan ta natalidu imaza, izua a kata雲山水. azua a drusa a taykaku imaza, avan a國立東華大學kata臺灣觀光學院. ruqivu a 'inamizukan ata kai na台灣客家 imaza. paljavak tua atjunang matja 20 qinaljan i Shoufeng. matja 16 qinaljan imaza, Ciamengan , Kiku , Banaw , Rinahem , Ciwidiyan , Telu´ , Cealalupalantdlu , Adetuman , Tdlu , Sawanengan , Taukak , Cihak , Cipuypuyan , Tumay , Sililasay , Siapaluway . izua a tapuluq sa lima a mula, mavan a: kata鹽寮村. sa izua a i tjaljaviri a 鹽寮村 itua shoufeng, a i tjaikaledep a viri ta ji'an. izua a i tjaljanavalj a 水璉村 itua shoufeng, a i tjaikaledep ta fenling, a i tjainavalj ta fengbin. kasicuayan kinaizuan aicu a qinaljan na caucau se amis(pangcah) kasicuayan. djemaljun a caucau se ciuku a semamaza ka qadjav a kacavilj a 1650. na semandjalananga a sihu na cing(ciuku) ta tjelu a djalan imaza i shoufeng gu. kasicuayanga, izauzua a karakudakuda a amiszuku imaza, izua a tjaljasangas ta vinecikvecik ni pairang ka 明永曆年間, qaw remingedjiji ta kisiya a djalan itjainavalj, tjaivecekan, tjaiviri ka viriviriljan tua 清朝, sa kimaumalj ta djalan tua semasasaw. ka ripunanan, aza sihu a papupicul ta ripung tua pasatavat a sekacedas, sa remingedjiji ta drusa a mula, izua a豐田村kata林田村, mavan a"壽役農莊" ;ka 1920 a cavilj, riningedjiji ta "壽區", qaw riningedjijiuta ta "壽庄" ka 1937 a cavilj, sa pinaljavek nua 花蓮港廳花蓮郡. ka ciukukuanan, alapen a vencik a "壽" kata"豐田"tua papungadan ta "壽豐" taimaza, sa remingedjiji ta花蓮縣壽豐鄉 a patjetucu. kadjunangan izua liaw a veljeluan imaza i shoufeng gu. caucau papupaysu tataleman kakiciqavan tatuluan izua alu a gakku a kedrikedri imaza i rinahem(shoufeng gu). izua drusa a taigakku imaza. biuing iyubingkiuku (yuzeng) sasupuan na iyubingkiuku 974 a sasupuan na iyubingkiku se shoufeng. remayurangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansivalj-C a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansipuluq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansipuluq saka ita-C a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 193 a palidring a djalan na kalinku basu basu na kalinku basu na taroko basu na tingtang kisiya djalan gungkang hikuki paravacan a racev tjeveus kalengleng veljevelj suyka kamulaw vuljangaw vuday djamay

Shoofeng Shoofeng go icowa i Hoalien. ala atjonangn mapoljat 206.4 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 27.53 km², ma'linaole atjonang 19.03 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 17,884 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 6,803 a daceneqlan, Amis (32%) a maqcowa caocao. paiwan a maqcowa caocao. sinipaljavakan taico a rinahem(siayaya a shio+ fongˋ hiongˋ na kinakaian a nginaingaian; siayaya a alopalan na kinakaian na sakizaya) a shoofeng go. a i pasakacedas a vecekadan aico a pinaljavakan a shoofeng go i to kalinko na taiwan. a i tjaikacedas izoa ljavek. a i pasanavalj ta marlimo katoa fakong. a i pasaviri ta cikasoan(ji'an go). a i pasakaledep a navalj ta malibasi(wanrong go). shoofeng('inamizokan: Rinahem；kai na sakizayazoko: Alopalan；kai na客家語海陸腔:shio+ fongˋ hiongˋ)i pasakacedas a vecekad toa kalingko toa taiwan, a i tjaiviri toa ji'an, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a xiolin, a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i wanrong, a i pasanavalj izoa a sefenling, sefengbin. izoa a vecekadan ta gado i tjaikaledep, ljemaveljavekan ta gado i tjaikacedas, kazatjan i vecekad i aico a goan. izoa a pana a 木瓜溪, 知亞干溪, 荖溪imaza. azoa a kinaqadavan namasan macoljocoljo a kinavaliana kinaqadavan imaza. azoa a natemalido a katjonangan i ljemaveljavekan imaza, sa pinaljavek na 東部海岸國家風景區. qaw liaw a pinaqenetjan ta natalido imaza, izoa a kata雲山水. azoa a drosa a taykako imaza, avan a國立東華大學kata臺灣觀光學院. roqivo a 'inamizokan ata kai na台灣客家 imaza. paljavak toa atjonang matja 20 qinaljan i Shoofeng. matja 16 qinaljan imaza, Ciamengan , Kiko , Banaw , Rinahem , Ciwidiyan , Telo´ , Cealalopalantdlo , Adetoman , Tdlo , Sawanengan , Taokak , Cihak , Cipoypoyan , Tomay , Sililasay , Siapaloway . izoa a tapoloq sa lima a mola, mavan a: kata鹽寮村. sa izoa a i tjaljaviri a 鹽寮村 itoa shoofeng, a i tjaikaledep a viri ta ji'an. izoa a i tjaljanavalj a 水璉村 itoa shoofeng, a i tjaikaledep ta fenling, a i tjainavalj ta fengbin. kasicoayan kinaizoan aico a qinaljan na caocao se amis(pangcah) kasicoayan. djemaljon a caocao se cioko a semamaza ka qadjav a kacavilj a 1650. na semandjalananga a siho na cing(cioko) ta tjelo a djalan imaza i shoofeng go. kasicoayanga, izaozoa a karakodakoda a amiszoko imaza, izoa a tjaljasangas ta vinecikvecik ni pairang ka 明永曆年間, qaw remingedjiji ta kisiya a djalan itjainavalj, tjaivecekan, tjaiviri ka viriviriljan toa 清朝, sa kimaomalj ta djalan toa semasasaw. ka riponanan, aza siho a papopicol ta ripong toa pasatavat a sekacedas, sa remingedjiji ta drosa a mola, izoa a豐田村kata林田村, mavan a"壽役農莊" ;ka 1920 a cavilj, riningedjiji ta "壽區", qaw riningedjijiota ta "壽庄" ka 1937 a cavilj, sa pinaljavek noa 花蓮港廳花蓮郡. ka ciokokoanan, alapen a vencik a "壽" kata"豐田"toa papongadan ta "壽豐" taimaza, sa remingedjiji ta花蓮縣壽豐鄉 a patjetoco. kadjonangan izoa liaw a veljeloan imaza i shoofeng go. caocao papopayso tataleman kakiciqavan tatoloan izoa alo a gakko a kedrikedri imaza i rinahem(shoofeng go). izoa drosa a taigakko imaza. bioing iyobingkioko (yozeng) sasopoan na iyobingkioko 974 a sasopoan na iyobingkiko se shoofeng. remayorangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansivalj-C a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansipoloq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansipoloq saka ita-C a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 193 a palidring a djalan na kalinko baso baso na kalinko baso na taroko baso na tingtang kisiya djalan gongkang hikoki paravacan a racev tjeveos kalengleng veljevelj soyka kamolaw voljangaw voday djamay
